programme.title: The Mummy
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Horror, Thriller, Sci Fi ║ 1999 ║ 12
programme.desc: Period horror adventure starring Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz. A party of archaeologists, led by American adventurer Rick O'Connell, discover a tomb containing the 3,000-year-old remains of a murderous Egyptian priest, Imhotep. When the mummy is accidentally disturbed, he unleashes his terrifying powers on those who have desecrated his resting place Stephen Sommers - Director Brendan Fraser - Rick O'Connell Rachel Weisz - Evelyn John Hannah - Jonathan Arnold Vosloo - Imhotep Kevin J O'Connor - Beni Jonathan Hyde - Egyptologist Oded Fehr - Ardeth Bay Omid Djalili - Warden.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-July 2025
programme.desc: A look ahead to this month's films.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.sub-title: Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action, Mystery ║ 2021 ║ 15
programme.desc: Thirty young men and women are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is what's outside the ship or who they're becoming inside it. Sci-fi thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Tye Sheridan and Lily-Rose Depp Neil Burger - Director Tye Sheridan - Christopher Lily-Rose Melody Depp - Sela Fionn Whitehead - Zac Chanté Adams - Phoebe Quintessa Swindell - Julie Archie Madekwe - Kai Isaac Hempstead Wright - Edward Viveik Kalra - Peter Madison Hu - Anda Archie Renaux - Alex Wern Lee - Tayo Colin Farrell (2) - Richard.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Tom Hiddleston, Brie Larson and Samuel L Jackson. A group of scientists and mercenaries are sent to a newly discovered Pacific island to investigate its unusual fauna. When their convoy is destroyed, the team faces a battle for survival against Skull Island's monstrous inhabitants - among them a certain giant ape Jordan Vogt-Roberts - Director Tom Hiddleston - James Conrad Brie Larson - Mason Weaver Samuel L Jackson - Lieutenant Colonel Packard John Goodman - Bill Randa John C Reilly - Hank Marlow Toby Kebbell - Jack Chapman / Kong Corey Hawkins - Houston Brooks John Ortiz (1) - Victor Nieves Shea Whigham - Cole Jing Tian - San Jason Mitchell - Mills Thomas Mann (2) - Slivko Marc Evan Jackson - Landsat Steve Richard Jenkins - Senator Willis Robert Taylor (4) - Athena captain Robert Taylor (4) - Athena captain.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Action, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 2024 ║ 12
programme.desc: Monster action adventure starring Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry and Dan Stevens. Since the Titans' last confrontation, Kong has decamped underground and is exploring the vast, fantastical world of "Hollow Earth". Meanwhile, Godzilla is up on the Earth's surface, keeping other monsters in check. However, a subterranean distress call initiates events that will see the two old foes face off against each other once again Adam Wingard - Director Rebecca Hall - Ilene Andrews Brian Tyree Henry - Bernie Hayes Dan Stevens - Trapper Kaylee Hottle - Jia Alex Ferns - Michael Fala Chen - Iwi Queen Rachel House - Hampton.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke and Mark Rylance. In 2045, society's main entertainment is an ultra-immersive virtual reality simulation called the "OASIS". Its late creator, James Halliday, has hidden an Easter egg within the game that, if unlocked, will grant ownership to the finder. Teen gamer Wade Watts is determined to win the prize, but he has lethal competition in the form of Halliday's ruthless business rival Nolan Sorrento Steven Spielberg - Director Tye Sheridan - Wade Watts / Parzival Olivia Cooke - Samantha / Art3mis Mark Rylance - James Halliday / Anorak Ben Mendelsohn - Nolan Sorrento Simon Pegg - Ogden Morrow / Curator T J Miller - i-R0k Hannah John-Kamen - F'Nale Zandor Lena Waithe - Helen / Aech Susan Lynch - Aunt Alice Ralph Ineson - Rick Win Morisaki - Toshiro / Daito Philip Zhao - Zhou / Sho Letitia Wright - Reb Clare Higgins - Mrs Gilmore.

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron. Snow White is on the run from her evil stepmother who has sent a group of men into the woods to capture her. But the huntsman leading the search learns that he is also a victim of the Queen's duplicity and aims to protect the girl - even if she seems quite capable of looking after herself Rupert Sanders - Director Kristen Stewart - Snow White Chris Hemsworth - The Huntsman Charlize Theron - Queen Ravenna Ian McShane - Beith Sam Claflin - William Toby Jones - Coll Nick Frost - Nion Ray Winstone - Gort Lily Cole - Greta Eddie Marsan - Duir Vincent Regan - Duke Hammond Bob Hoskins - Muir Rachael Sterling - Anna Johnny Harris - Quert Noah Huntley - King Magnus Sam Spruell - Finn Mark Wingett - Thomas Matt Berry - Percy Joey Ansah - Aldan Brian Gleeson - Gus.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Thriller, Horror ║ 2001 ║ PG
programme.desc: Period horror adventure sequel starring Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz. programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: Period action romance starring Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh and Zhang Ziyi. China in the 19th century: having failed to avenge the murder of his master by the evil Jade Fox, martial arts expert Li Mu Bai renounces fighting for a life of meditation. programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: Oscar-winning romantic drama starring Ali MacGraw and Ryan O'Neal. programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 1993 ║ PG
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's blockbuster adventure, starring Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum and Richard Attenborough. Billionaire tycoon John Hammond has built the ultimate theme park - an island populated by genetically engineered dinosaurs. A group of guests, including Hammond's grandchildren, are invited to preview the attraction, touring the park in remotely controlled cars. programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. An idealistic young journalist gets an opportunity to work with her idol, veteran Washington political columnist Nick Booker. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. programme.title: Five Nights at Freddy's
programme.desc: Mike Schmidt accepts a position as night-time security guard at the abandoned pizzeria, where families used to flock in their droves in the 1980s. programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious order's terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: After her harrowing experience in 1950s Romania, Sister Irene moves to France and enjoys a quieter pace of life, guiding fresh-faced Sister Debra. Cardinal Conroy brings dire news - the ancient evil has escaped from Romania and is moving steadily eastwards across Europe, purpose unknown. He entreats Sister Irene to stop this murderous menace, and Sister Debra defies the Abbess to provide support. programme.title: Arrival

programme.title: Afraid
programme.sub-title: Horror, Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Unbeaten in seven Premier League games, Aston Villa travel to north London to face Ange Postecoglou's Spurs, who haven't beaten Villa at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium since 2021. (03.11).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Arne Slot's toughest test yet comes at the Emirates as Liverpool arrive to face Arsenal. With a mounting injury list, the Gunners are also without a suspended William Saliba. (27.10).
